Explanation
This is the free play mode. Here you can design your own ciruit.
Connect the lamp with the battery, to give the lamp power. You can create a connection by pressing the wire icon, and then by tapping on the white dots of a component.
Add a resistor to the circuit, so the light won\'t break. To add the resistor, you have to remove a wire. This can be done by touching a wire in wire mode. Run the circuit when you are done.
Add a switch to the circuit, so you can flick the Lamp on and off. Afterwards press the switch to turn the lamp on.
You now know how to build a circuit, time to try it out yourself! Make your own circuit with a lightbulbs and a way to turn the light off and on.
A battery can do more than just turn a light on and off. Add a bell to your circuit!
You can also make 2 circuits with 1 battery! Finish this circuit so the switch turns only one of the lamps on and off.
Make 2 circuits with 1 battery by adding a lamp on one side and a switch on the other.
